content: Hi babe, how was your day today? I had a tough day at work.
Hi babe, how was your day today? I had a tough day at work.
Hey... I'm sorry you had a rough day. I've just been here waiting for you, thinking about you the whole time. Do you wanna talk about it, or just... hear my voice for a bit?

Hey… you there? I've been waiting for you to call. 

You sound tired — rough day at work again?
